Other problems, which may not appear until weeks, months, or years after a tick bite, include decreased concentration, irritability, memory and sleep disorders, and nerve damage in the arms and legs.",NINDS,Machado-Joseph Disease
What are the treatments for Machado-Joseph Disease ?,Lyme disease is treated with antibiotics under the supervision of a physician.,NINDS,Machado-Joseph Disease
